title: Passenger vehicle wholesales in slow lane in May due to high base effect, elections
description: Passenger vehicle wholesales in India grew marginally in May due to the high base effect and muted demand during the general elections. Maruti Suzuki, Hyundai, Tata Motors, Mahindra & Mahindra, Toyota Kirloskar Motor, Kia India, and MG Motor India all reported varying levels of growth.
